page.title: 02RECREATION IN WORTHING
page.content: There is a wide variety of clubs and parks in Worthing to keep you occupied Also there is quite a nice beach when it is warm however when the weather is cold there is a nice swimming pool. There is a railway station which goes almost anywhere ranging from Ports, mouth to London.There is a boating lake at Brooklands pleasure park which is nice when it is warm.There is a fire service and hospital very near by in case of emergency,and there is a police station at hand There is bowls in the summer in beach hove park which is very peaceful.There is a playground for children near the beach and also tennis courts and flower garden,there is also mini golf and putting games which are fun.In Homefield park there is a football pitch and swings and a climbing frame.By Louise A from Lyndhurst School.
